name: 60 Second Supermarket Sweep
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 44

Note: If you're having frame-rate issues, we've included  graphics options in the main menu so you can adjust for something that works for you. 

Controls: WASD to move, F to Interact, Esc to pause the game and access the options

Objective: Fetch all the items on your shopping list before the store closes.
